items.title: Identity Proof
items.description: Aadhar Card, Pan Card, Voter ID, Passport,Driving License.

items.title: Address Proof
items.description: Driving  License, Voter ID, Electricity bill, Credit Card / bank statement, Rent agreement.

items.title: Income Proof
items.description: Latest 6 months bank statements, latest 6 months pay slips, and form 16, latest 2-year ITR.

items.title: Property Documents
items.description: All past chain agreements, society letter, property tax bill
